author: dinyar
body:
#### PR description:

Added logic to the (un)packers to deal with the new "two loose showers" bit that will be used in 2023. The logic for those changes is gated behind either the firmware version that was extracted from the readout record or by the era. Once this PR is approved I will create a backport for 13_0_X.

attn @eyigitba and @elfontan

#### PR validation:

No validation beyond the standard tests possible while the loose shower logic hasn't been implemented in the upstream systems.
title: Update muon shower (un)packers for 2023 running
